title: Ordinance pertaining to wearing pants below the waist in public.

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.  117  INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN MARLENE DAVIS  An Ordinance pertaining to the wearing of pants below the waist in public; repealing Ordinance 60546, which is codified as Chapter 15.30 of the Revised Code of the City of St. Louis, and enacting in lieu thereof new a provision pertaining to the wearing of pants below the waist in public and containing an emergency clause.
